entry.name: HealthProbe-no-log
entry.description: This rule allow receiving Healthprobe packets on untrust and trust interfaces, no logs activated.

entry.name: HealthProbe-noNAT
entry.description: This rule is used to terminate Healthprobe packet on all interfaces but avoid forward the Healthprobe packet to a target.

entry.name: Outbound
entry.description: This rule is used to NAT all outbound packet behind eth1/1 interface IP address.

entry.name: Http-IN-VM2
entry.description: This rule is used to Destination NAT packet to the Linux target instance. As we use an Active/Passive cluster, there is no need for SNAT.

entry.name: crowdstrike
entry.description: CrowdStrike is a SaaS (software as a service) solution that leverages advanced EDR (endpoint detection and response) applications and techniques to provide an industry-leading NGAV (next generation anti-virus) offering powered by machine learning to ensure breaches are stopped before they occur.

entry.name: firmex-downloading
entry.description: Firmex is the virtual data room for secure document sharing in M&A, due diligence, compliance, litigation, corporate transactions. This appid covers the browser's downloading traffic for firmex.

entry.name: firmex-base
entry.description: Firmex is a cloud-based Virtual data room service provider. Firmex is virtual data room for secure document sharing in M&A, due diligence, compliance, litigation, corporate transactions. This appid covers the base browser traffic for firmex.

entry.name: firmex
entry.description: Firmex is a cloud-based Virtual data room service provider. Firmex is virtual data room for secure document sharing in M&A, due diligence, compliance, litigation, corporate transactions. This appid covers the base browser traffic for firmex.

entry.name: firmex-uploading
entry.description: Firmex is the virtual data room for secure document sharing in M&A, due diligence, compliance, litigation, corporate transactions. This appid covers the browser's uploading traffic for firmex.

entry.name: resilio
entry.description: Resilio Sync (formerly BitTorrent Sync) by Resilio, Inc. is a proprietary peer-to-peer file synchronization tool. It can sync files between devices on a local network, or between remote devices over the Internet via a modified version of the BitTorrent protocol.

entry.name: workplace-downloading
entry.description: Workplace is an enterprise connectivity platform developed by Facebook, Inc. and featuring tools like groups, instant messaging and News Feed. This App-ID covers the file downloading of workplace.

entry.name: workplace-base
entry.description: Workplace is an enterprise connectivity platform developed by Facebook, Inc. and featuring tools like groups, instant messaging and News Feed.

entry.name: workplace
entry.description: Workplace is an enterprise connectivity platform developed by Facebook, Inc. and featuring tools like groups, instant messaging and News Feed.

entry.name: workplace-uploading
entry.description: Workplace is an enterprise connectivity platform developed by Facebook, Inc. and featuring tools like groups, instant messaging and News Feed. This App-ID covers the uploading of workplace.
